headline: Should Gartner’s AI Storage Endorsement and Hyperscaler Deals Require Action From Pure Storage (PSTG) Investors?
summary: In recent months, Pure Storage has shifted further into software-defined, AI-focused data center storage, earning recognition from Gartner as the technology leader in enterprise storage platforms and deepening partnerships with hyperscalers such as Meta and NVIDIA. This progress underscores how Pure Storage’s high-density, low-power all-flash systems and data management software are becoming critical infrastructure for AI workloads across large-scale data centers. We’ll now explore how...

headline: Gartner (IT) Is Down 6.6% After Cutting Revenue Outlook Amid AI Jitters And Slower Contract Growth
summary: In the past quarter, Gartner, Inc. cut its full-year revenue growth guidance after contract value growth slowed to 5%, down from 7% in the prior quarter, amid tariff uncertainty, budget pressures, and questions about whether generative AI could erode demand for its research. An interesting wrinkle is that some long-term investors used this period of weaker growth and AI-related skepticism to increase their exposure to Gartner’s subscription-led advisory model. We’ll now explore how Gartner’s...

headline: What Makes Gartner (IT) an Investment Choice?
summary: Artisan Partners, an investment management company, released its “Artisan Mid Cap Value Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, the fund’s Investor Class fund ARTQX returned 0.97%, Advisor Class fund APDQX posted a return of 0.98%, and Institutional Class fund APHQX returned 0.97%, compared to […]
